title: /setspawn命令不好用是怎么回事
author: dajiangtang
txt_content:
/setspawn命令不好用是怎么回事  打完以后出来 unknown command. type ''help'' for help.
其他命令都好用。就这个不好用

replies.author: rickky2
replies.txt_content: 服务器原本没有这指令，需要bukkit插件Essentials

replies.author: dajiangtang
replies.txt_content: 我有es插件。都说了别的命令都好用。就是setspawn不好用
